TopicTitle: SL: Extended: an Instagram video clip series I'm making based on the concept: what if NASA had rushed the space shuttle's development to save Skylab.

Articles.Content:
I have a storyline planned out and plan to work on the first clip once bdb drops its next update as it involves skylab's launch if you guys are interested heres my insta i have a few teaser images and a clip.

https://www.instagram.com/evan_hates_rocketry/?hl=en

e
I liked these videos. I hope NASA will notice you.
